title: 服务端几行的报错
author: nikoniko_ni
txt_content:
[08:46:10 WARN]: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: ""
[08:46:10 WARN]:        at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknow
n Source)
[08:46:10 WARN]:        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
[08:46:10 WARN]:        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
[08:46:10 WARN]:        at net.coreprotect.thread.CheckUpdate.run(CheckUpdate.ja
va:52)
[08:46:10 WARN]:        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[08:46:22 INFO]: [LWC] [LWC] The updater ran into a minor issue: Server returned
 HTTP response code: 522 for URL: http://update.griefcraft.com/lwc/branch/stable
/LATEST复制代码

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 没问题的，只是提示你ProtocolLib和LWC插件有更新，自动下载失败而已。 无视即可

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content: LWC插件更新，需要重启服务器

replies.author: SYS_TEM
replies.txt_content:
这几行报错没有影响
我的服务器就有基本上一模一样的报错
一样正常使用
